scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Each fiscal year states submitted documents to the ARC outlining a plan of fiscal management and program development for its Appalachian counties. This section is arranged alphabetically by state and further subdivided chronologically. The materials for each state and year vary considerably; they range from correspondence to drafts of the comprehensive state plan, and from specific program plans (e.g. health, economic, child development) to plans submitted for only the Appalachian portion of a state. Each state is not chronologically complete. Note that abstracts and summaries of State Plans are located in Boxes 355-356.
